attributes.action: ban Pope Benedict XVI from entering the UK due to his promotion of homophobia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government have recently banned Fred Waldron Phelps Snr. and Shirley Phelps-Roper of the Westboro Baptist Church from entering the UK due to them "engaging in unacceptable behaviour by fostering hatred which might lead to inter-community violence in the United Kingdom."

We the undersigned request that for the same reasons Pope Benedict XVI should also be banned from the UK for his intolerant, offensive, indefensible and reprehensible views on homosexuality, e.g. that gay people are "as big a threat to the future of humanity as climate change."

rejection.details: For individual cases, please contact the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
